import React, { useState } from 'react' export default function News() { const [news, setNews] = useState({title:"", stitle:"", bodytext:"", subtitle:"", subbodytext:""}); const [error, setError] = useState(null); const handleType = ()=>{ setError(null); const {name, value} = e.target; setAbout((stateBefore)=>({...stateBefore, [name]:value,})); } const saveHandle = ()=>{ } return (
